attributes.action: Re-instate the price cap on energy companies
attributes.additional_details:
Energy companies are making record profits year after year, receiving subsidies and assisted by the uk government costing the tax payer. 
The tactic France have taken over this is a true commitment to its people, making sure energy cost do not increase for families and making these big energy companies make the up the difference. The government needs to stop squeezing every last penny from struggling families.
attributes.background: Reduce energy bills, make energy companies that recorded insane amounts of profits over the last few years to absorb the increase

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Ofgem continues to set a price cap for energy. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
